Service Details: Offers free English as a Second Language (ESL) courses for beginners to low intermediate speakers
Dates: Please see the website for the schedule: http://evangelbc.org/esl/Term:- Spring Semester: 2nd week of January – June.- Summer Semester: (To be announced)- Fall Semester: September – the 3rd week of December. (winter break: the last week of December & the first week of January)
Eligibility: Ages: 15 year(s) and upThese classes are for anybody at a beginning level or a low intermediate and want to learn and practice basic reading, listening and speaking
How to Apply: Please email for information or call Evangel Church office
Cost: - Drop-in classes, no registration is required- No text fee- No tuition fee- No commitment for the class, just drop in (except for the Introduction Level classes) and learn when you have time- Each day's content is different- You do not need to be a Christian to participate in the classes  SUGGESTED donation at each class is $1 which will go towards office supplies such as: projector bulb, paper, ink cartridge, disposable plates and cups. There is a donation box next to snack.
Address & Map: Evangel Church3261 Gordon DrKelowna, BC     V1W 3N4
